description_zh: 允许用户从其设备中选择文件，并访问所选文件。
description_en: Allow a user to pick a file from their device, and access the chosen file.

conditions.description_zh: 在进行文件选择时触发。
conditions.description_en: Triggered when a file selection is made.

actions.description_zh: 释放文件，使其不再使用内存。
actions.description_en: Release a file so it is no longer using memory.

actions.description_zh: 激活文件选择器，就像点击了文件选择器按钮一样。注意，这可能只在用户输入触发器中有效。
actions.description_en: Activate the file picker as if the file chooser button was clicked. Note this may only work in a user input trigger.

actions.description_zh: 清除当前所有已选择的文件，恢复为初始状态。
actions.description_en: Clear any existing file selection from the file picker, restoring it to its initial state.

expressions.description_zh: 索引中所选文件的名称。
expressions.description_en: Name of chosen file at an index.

expressions.description_zh: 索引处所选文件的大小。
expressions.description_en: Size of chosen file at an index.

expressions.description_zh: 索引中所选文件的MIME类型。
expressions.description_en: MIME type of chosen file at an index.

expressions.description_zh: 用于在索引处访问所选文件数据的URL。
expressions.description_en: A URL to access the data of the chosen file at an index.

properties.description_zh: 文件类型过滤器，例如 .png 或 image/*
properties.description_en: File type filter, e.g. .png or image/*

properties.description_zh: 是否允许单个或多个文件选择。
properties.description_en: Whether to allow single or multiple file selection.

properties.description_zh: 在场景开始时，对象是否可见。
properties.description_en: Choose if the object is visible when the layout starts.

properties.description_zh: 控件的可选ID，允许使用页面HTML中的CSS设置样式。
properties.description_en: An optional ID for the element allowing it to be styled with CSS.

properties.description_zh: 可选项，添加 Class 元素来设置样式。
properties.description_en: An optional class for the element allowing it to be styled with CSS.
